trans-unit.source: Please approve your consent
trans-unit.target: Please approve your consent

trans-unit.source: Hello %s
trans-unit.target: Hello %s

trans-unit.source: your consent was registered successfully. Please click the following link to approve it:
trans-unit.target: your consent was registered successfully. Please click the following link to approve it:

trans-unit.source: If you feel this consent was given by accident or if you want to dismiss it, please click the following link:
trans-unit.target: If you feel this consent was given by accident or if you want to dismiss it, please click the following link:

trans-unit.source: The consent mail could not be sent.
trans-unit.target: The consent mail could not be sent.

trans-unit.source: Invalid link
trans-unit.target: Invalid link

trans-unit.source: The link you clicked is no longer valid or has already been clicked. Please fill out the form again.
trans-unit.target: The link you clicked is no longer valid or has already been clicked. Please fill out the form again.

trans-unit.source: Invalid email address
trans-unit.target: Invalid email address

trans-unit.source: The email address sent with the link is not valid. Please fill out the form again.
trans-unit.target: The email address sent with the link is not valid. Please fill out the form again.

trans-unit.source: Consent already given
trans-unit.target: Consent already given

trans-unit.source: The link you clicked has already been clicked. This means that consent has already been given and the link is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: The link you clicked has already been clicked. This means that consent has already been given and the link is no longer valid.

trans-unit.source: Unknown error
trans-unit.target: Unknown error

trans-unit.source: An unknown error has occurred. Please try clicking the link from the email again. If the problem persists, please fill out the form again.
trans-unit.target: An unknown error has occurred. Please try clicking the link from the email again. If the problem persists, please fill out the form again.

trans-unit.source: Consent successful
trans-unit.target: Consent successful

trans-unit.source: Thank you, your approval was successful. You can now delete the email.
trans-unit.target: Thank you, your approval was successful. You can now delete the email.

trans-unit.source: Consent successfully revoked
trans-unit.target: Consent successfully revoked

trans-unit.source: You have successfully revoked your consent. You can now delete the email.
